title: Debonair Taric
body:
I demand a Taric skin which is in the debonair style.

The new visual upgrade would fit perfectly for this and it would create a great team combo.
-Debonair Galio, Mid
-Debonair Vi, Jungle
-Debonair Jayce, Toplane
-Debonair Taric, Support
-Debonair Ezreal, Attack Damage Carry


Thank you.{{champion:44}}

replies.body: so you talk about a gay botlane?^^{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
